forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 14C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies with a few showers this afternoon. High 59F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 13C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low around 55F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 16C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High around 60F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 56F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 16C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 52F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and some clouds. High 62F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 53F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 57F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 6C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 43F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then clearing with ample sunshine in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then clearing with ample sunshine in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 43F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 56F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 44F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 56F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.
